column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////As far as bloodies go
column2: this place is a 10. There's a bloody mary bar with everything you could ever want in a bloody. Peppar Vodka? yep. Three different kinds of tomato juice? yep. Bacon? yep. Shrimp? sure
column3: why not. You literally can't go wrong when you can make it exactly how you like it
column4: just make sure you leave room for everything they have to add to it.
